msItem.title: Risalah-i Wasi Qutb or Risalah-i Wusul. On the basic principles of the Muslim faith.
msItem.note: Flyleaf before text, verso a) List of contents in Persian, with price, in siyaq, 4 rupees (?). b) Pasted slip, the name printed: presented by Sir George Staunton Bart. February 5, 1825 G H N. F1a: a) Note of ownership by MSAYL? Khan, in Persian, partly defaced. b) Nore of price: 5 rupees. Blank pages between the three works and assorted flyleaves covered with various notes and scribbles. The first title seems to be the title in the colophon; the second is given on the verso of the flyleaf preceding the text. Bound with two other works, all in different formats. Codrington/Reade Nos 348(2), 348 (3). Author may possibly be Wasi Qutb (unidentified).
msItem.incipit: Incipit, after benediction: bidankih iman iqrar kardan ast

bindingDesc.p: English binding, brown half-leather and marbled paper.

acquisition.p: Presented by Sir George Staunton Bart.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
